result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

This case dismissed and read in this date.  Def appeared in custody of LaCrosse County Sheriff with Attorney Lisa McDougal.  Jennifer Harper appeared for the State.  Pleas entered and sentencing set in 16CF28.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 29, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 3, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 1, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Lessa A. Meboe not in court. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lisa A McDougal in court for Defendant Lessa A. Meboe. DA requests setover to June 1 @ 2:30. So ordered.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 1, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
email request for rescheduling of June 1st date.
Adjourned initial appearance on April 22, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 1, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Lessa A. Meboe in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin.  16CF28 and 15CF97 called together, both for adjourned initial.  Court notes def has waived prelim time limits but not the prelim itself.  Atty. M states def will continue to waive prelim time limits; notes offer was just received from DA Harper; asks for another date.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 1, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance at 03-16-2016 02:30 pm

Defendant Lessa A. Meboe in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives formal reading of complaint. Court informs def of the charges/max possible penalties. Def waives time periods for prelim. Defense requests status in 30 days.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 16, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance at 02-01-2016 01:30 pm

Defendant Lessa A. Meboe in court. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lisa A McDougal appeared by phone means for Defendant Lessa A. Meboe.  Court states the charge and informs def of the possible max. penalties as well as def's right to prelim.  Atty. M - defense waives prelim time limits and requests status scheduling.  Court sets 2/24 at 1:30 - AIA as reminder prelim not yet held.   

Bond poster JH in court; requests money back.  DA has no objection to bond poster getting money back but wants $500 cash bond to remain as the order of the court; notes charges filed and those contemplated in this matter; believes $500 cash is still appropriate.  Court orders $500 posted be returned to JH.  Atty. M asks for sig bond til 2/1.  Court will allow.  $1000 signature bond  - bond to be reconsidered 2/1.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Bail review hearing done today due to DA Harper informing the judge of an emergency situation.
Initial appearance at 01-21-2016 01:30 pm

Bail Review - Defendant Lessa A. Meboe appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lisa A McDougal appeared by phone means for Defendant Lessa A. Meboe. Atty JH asks for warrant to be lifted, bail bond remain the same.  So ordered by court.  Initial appearance scheduled for January 21, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Other Jinitta Henderson appeared by phone means. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lisa A McDougal in court for Defendant Lessa A. Meboe. Defendant Lessa A. Meboe not in court.  JH is the bond poster; wants her $ back.  DA states that def is in custody in LaCrosse; asks for warrant to secure her appearance once she's subject to release.  DA states that the bond poster has to have the def back in court in order to make her request.  ADA states def was on a chapter hold; LaCrosse Co. was notified she could be picked up; far as known, def is in the LaCrosse County Jail.  Court issues a warrant in this case and informs JH that, as soon as it's known def is back in custody, clerk will be notified so that bond can be released to JH.
Response from Judge to bond poster.
Request of bond poster for refund of bond money.
Adjourned initial appearance at 01-06-2016 09:00 am
Adjourned initial appearance at 12-02-2015 09:00 am

Defendant Lessa A. Meboe in court.  Attorney Lisa A McDougal appeared by phone means for Defendant Lessa A. Meboe. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared via telephone for State of Wisconsin. Court informs def of the charge, will reschedule as def has not had the opportunity to confer with her counsel.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 2, 2015 at 09:00 am.
